sections.heading: Clinical presentation and diagnosis
sections.summary: Diagnostic criteriaCore symptomsOther commonly co-occuring symptoms ME/CFS is a chronic life-altering condition, ranging from mild to very severe – resulting in a wide range of functional impairments, where some patients can work while others are homebound or bedbound. ME/CFS affects many different organ systems, and the constellation of symptoms can vary between individuals and can fluctuate from day to day.
